attributes.action: Bring back our troops to defend our own citizen's at home
attributes.additional_details: In view of the increasing violent gangland knife crime throughout our Nation and the recent discraceful scenes of violence and looting in north London against our own citizen's and businesses. I believe that it would be far preferable for our forces to be brought home to defend our own citizen's and to restore law and order on our streets at home rather than fighting a very unpopular war that will continually lead to even more soldiers lives being lost.
